text:
Many travelers to Peru tend to skip over Lima
as they rush off to more scenic destinations,

but we’re of the opinion that the capital
has a lot to offer.

As one of the largest cities in South America,
Lima can be a little chaotic and crowded,

but it is also full of surprises, especially
in terms of culinary experiences and historic
attractions.

In this travel video guide, we’re going
to take you on a tour of the city and show
you 30 things to do in Lima, Peru.
